APP_DESCRIPTION: Retrobox is like a virtual suggestion box. Create a box for you or your team to put items into, then at your next retrospective you can drop the items out to review them.
BOX_EXPLANATION: A drop is a collection of items that were emptied from a box at a given point in time
CREATE_BOX_ERROR_MIN_LENGTH: A name must be longer than 4 characters
CREATE_ITEM_NAME_HELPER_TEST: (Optional) Let your team know who added this item
CREATE_ITEM_NAME_NO_CONTENT_ERROR: You must include a message as part of your submission
CREATE_ITEM_RETRO_ITEM_HELPER_TEST: What would you lke to discuss at the next retrospective?
ITEM_ADDED_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: We've added a new item for you
ITEM_ADDED_FAILED_MESSAGE: Something went wrong trying to add an item
DROP_CREATED_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: We've created a new drop for you
DROP_CREATED_FAILED_MESSAGE: Something went wrong trying to create a drop
LOGIN_FORM_ERROR_PATTERN: Please enter a valid email address
LOGIN_FORM_ON_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: We've sent a magic link to {email}
LOGIN_PAGE_FORM_TITLE: Log in or create a new account
LOGIN_PAGE_LOGIN_ERROR: Oops! We couldn't log you in, try sending another magic link
